notes.title: Gettysburg Address
notes.excerpt: Four score and seven years ago...

notes.title: Kennedy Inauguration
notes.excerpt: And so, my fellow Americans: ask not what your country can do for youâ€“ask what you can do for your country...

notes.title: Reagan at Brandenburg Gate
notes.excerpt: We believe that freedom and security go together, that the advance of human liberty can only strengthen the cause of world peace...
